mapper.sql:
SELECT Q.QUESTION_NO AS questionNo, Q.QUESTION_TITLE AS questionTitle, Q.QUESTION_CONTENT AS questionContent, Q.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, Q.VIEW_COUNT AS viewCount, Q.MODIFIED_TIME AS modifiedTime,
M.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, M.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName,
NVL(( SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN RECOMMEND_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN RECOMMEND_STATUS = 'D' THEN -1 ELSE 0 END ) FROM TJ_QUESTION_RECOMMEND R WHERE R.QUESTION_NO = Q.QUESTION_NO ), 0) AS recommendScore,
NVL(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TJ_ANSWER A WHERE A.REF_BOARD_NO = Q.QUESTION_NO ), 0) AS answerCount
mapper.select: FROM TJ_QUESTION Q JOIN TJ_MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY Q.CREATE_TIME DESC
FROM TJ_QUESTION_SAVE S JOIN TJ_QUESTION Q ON S.QUESTION_NO = Q.QUESTION_NO JOIN TJ_MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE S.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY Q.CREATE_TIME DESC
FROM TJ_QUESTION Q JOIN TJ_MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE Q.IS_DELETED = 'N' ORDER BY Q.VIEW_COUNT DESC

SELECT A.ANSWER_NO answerNo, A.ANSWER_CONTENT answerContent, A.CREATE_TIME createTime, M.MEMBER_ID memberId, M.MEMBER_NAME memberName, A.REF_BOARD_NO refBoardNo, NVL(( SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN RECOMMEND_STATUS = 'Y' THEN 1 WHEN RECOMMEND_STATUS = 'D' THEN -1 ELSE 0 END ) FROM TJ_ANSWER_RECOMMEND R WHERE R.ANSWER_NO = A.ANSWER_NO ), 0) AS recommendScore FROM TJ_ANSWER A JOIN TJ_MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE A.REF_BOARD_NO = #{ questionNo } ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC
